peregrine.config.partitioner
Interface Partitioner

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePartitioner, GlobalSortPartitioner, HashPartitioner, RangePartitioner
public interface Partitioner

Interface for handling partitioning keys. Takes a given key and routes it to the correct partition.
